sentences.en: He lit a cigaret in order to calm his mind.
sentences.cn: 他点燃一支香烟，镇定一下情绪。

sentences.en: I like having cigaret with my drink.
Put your cigaret out before you put the light out.
sentences.cn: 在熄灯前要把雪茄烟弄熄.

sentences.en: RA 7171 plows back annually 15 percent of cigaret excise tax revenues collected by the National Government to the virginia leaf producing provinces of Ilocos Sur, Ilocos Norte, La Union and Abra.
sentences.cn: RA 7171把国家政府每年征收的卷烟消费税，每年向弗吉尼亚烟叶生产省南伊洛克斯省、北伊洛克斯省、拉乌尼翁和埃尔阿布拉再投资15%。

sentences.en: The busboy who alerted patrons of the fire at the Hills Super Club said that cigaret butts dumped into soiled tablelinen may have caused the fatal blaze.
sentences.cn: 向客人惊呼希尔斯高级俱乐部起火了的餐厅侍者说，这场损失惨重的大火很可能是由于把香烟蒂到在弄脏了的桌布里引起的。

trans.tran_en: (cigarette)a thin tube of paper filled with finely cut tobacco that people smoke
